workflow.name: Hack-a-Thon - Umbrella - Alerting V2 - Incident Aggregation
workflow.title: Hack-a-Thon - Umbrella - Alerting V2 - Incident Aggregation

properties.name: Temp_Domain_Table
properties.description: Temp domain table to store unique domain values

Enable near real time notification for Umbrella Security events
- Notify in Cisco Webex or others
- Create Casebook and create or update  Incident in CTR
- Create Case in The Hive
- Create Case in ServiceNow
- Notification update in Cisco Team
- Feeds the stat table

Set Global Variable Umbrella_loop_counter to 500 before to run
Enable Triggers 5mn for permanent execution
properties.display_name: Hack-a-Thon - Umbrella - Alerting V2 - Incident Aggregation

properties.description: Check the loop counter (global variable). If not 500 it means a workflow is still running so do nothing)
Limit to 500 iteration set by SXAO global env variable

properties.script:
import json, sys
list1  = json.loads(sys.argv[1])
list_set = set(list1)
unique = []
unique_list = (list(list_set))
for x in unique_list:
    unique.append(x)

properties.description:
TheHive Instance
- to sync up the Cases and Observables
- to start the Analyzers
Enter your Cisco Umbrella Reporting API (https://docs.umbrella.com/umbrella-api/docs/reporting-api-authentication) and set auth to Basic

properties.name: Cisco Teams BOT Token
properties.description: Enter here your Teams Bot token (https://developer.webex.com/docs/bots)- Remember to create a room named Alerting in Teams and add your bot as member

properties.name: Loop Counter  Umbrella Alerting AO
properties.description: Should be set to 500 at first run of the AO

properties.name: Umbrella_Org_ID
properties.description: Enter here your Umbrella Org ID
